title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A refreshing salad made with crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender beef strips cooked in a creamy mushroom and onion sauce, served over egg noodles.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A colorful mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce, served over steamed rice.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A classic pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, and olive oil.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Delicious homemade cookies filled with chocolate chips, perfect for dessert or a snack.

title: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
summary: Juicy shrimp cooked in a flavorful lemon garlic butter sauce, served with rice or pasta.
